p: The concept of a just transition, while studied extensively, has been difficult to implement and actively resisted globally [36]. However, multiple initiatives are emerging with financial backing and political momentum. The State of Colorado’s creation of its Just Transition Office is the first effort at a statewide scale in the United States. Poland presented a Solidarity and Just Transition Silesia Declaration in 2018 [37]. The European Commission proposed developed the Coal Regions in Transition (CRiT) platform in 2019, followed by a new Just Transition Mechanism in 2020 [38].
